name: sekoiaio
label: SEKOIA.IO XDR
description: SEKOIA.IO eXtended Detection and Response SaaS platform leverages Cyber Threat Intelligence to combine anticipation with automated incident response. SEKOIA.IO XDR offers open, transparent and flexible security oversight to break down silos and neutralise threats before impact, using intelligence. This connector facilitates automated operations related to alerts, assets and events.

fields.title: API Key
fields.name: api_key
fields.description: Specify the API key used to access the SEKOIA.IO XDR server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify Certificate
fields.name: verify_certificate
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.

fields.title: Proxy
fields.name: proxy
fields.description: Specifies whether the proxy for the server is to be verified or not.

operations.title: Get Events
operations.description: Search events according the query from SEKOIA.IO XDR based on the query, earliest time, and latest time you have specified.

parameters.title: Query
parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The query to search events

parameters.title: Earliest Time
parameters.name: earliest_time
parameters.description: The earliest time of the time range of the search

parameters.title: Latest Time
parameters.name: latest_time
parameters.description: The latest time of the time range of the search

operations.title: List Alerts

parameters.title: Short ID
